title: Partner's transferable interest in partnership
context: ยง425-127 Partner&rsquo;s transferable interest in partnership. The only transferable interest of a partner in the partnership is the partner&rsquo;s share of the profits and losses of the partnership and the partner&rsquo;s right to receive distributions. The interest is personal property. [L 1999, c 284, pt of ยง1]
